ModMetaData.name: Shoo!
ModMetaData.author: jamaicancastle
ModMetaData.description: Adds a new designator that allows you to harmlessly shoo wild animals away from your base.\n\nPawns assigned to Handling will shoo animals out of your base. These animals will move through doors if necessary to leave the colony. Wild or dangerous animals have a chance to resist based on the colonist's Animals skill.
